Pre-Game Insights: India are not looking at 'tactical' changes but may give some game time to Prasidh Krishna or R Ashwin.
Virat Kohli is chasing a century that will put him where no man has ever gone before - 50 ODI tons.
Rohit Sharma hinted that there won't be any tinkering with personnel with just a week to go in the World Cup.
India have had a six-day break since their last game against South Africa.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The temperature in Bengaluru on Sunday, November 12 will be 27°C during the day and 16°C at night.
The chances of rain are 2% during the day and 3% at night, so the match will not be affected by rain.
The pitch at M. Chinnaswamy Stadium is considered good for batting and many teams have posted big totals there.
The highest-ever team total at the stadium is 401/6 by New Zealand, which they posted in ICC World Cup 2023.
Others: India vs Netherlands have a history of 2 wins each in their last 2 matches.
Scott Edwards is a good player of spin bowling, averaging 62.77 over 820 balls in ODI cricket.
Max O'Dowd is a quality player going through a wretched run of form in this World Cup with just 108 runs from 8 innings with a best of 42.
